titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Letters in an Extra-Illustrated Copy of Representative Poems of Living Poets
Representative Poems of Living Poets (Letters in an Extra-Illustrated Copy of)

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Sunday December 9, 2018 at 05:12

did.unittitle: Letters in an extra-illustrated copy of Representative Poems of Living Poets

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Consists of an extra-illustrated copy that includes letters and signatures.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The letters in the extra-illustrated copy of Representative poems of living poets . . . are the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Name of author], in extra-illustrated copy of Representative poems of living poets, American and English: selected by the poets themselves . Yale Collection Of American Literature, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists of an extra-illustrated copy of Representative poems of living poets, American and English: selected by the poets themselves that includes letters and signatures.
